Package es.gencom.mpegg.format

Class DatasetHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.gencom.mpegg.format.GenInfo<DatasetHeader>
      • es.gencom.mpegg.format.DatasetHeader
  • public class DatasetHeader
extends GenInfo<DatasetHeader>

    ISO/IEC 23092-1 Dataset Header implementation (6.5.2.2).

    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro
